messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] cleaning
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/5/03 7:35:49 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... We do clean out the toys every so often but I never do it without my children s say so (I
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/5/03 7:35:49 PM Eastern Standard Time,
superdiva@... writes:

> While they were sleeping, I would quietly pack them up and put the old ones
> in storage and bring out the "new" ones from storage.

We do clean out the toys every so often but I never do it without my
children's say so (I consider their toys to be their property) and they
decide which toys can go and which stay and where they go. To charity, trash
or just to the garage if they aren't ready to part with them yet.


>>"This room should look like this picture." <<
While I like most of your suggestions this seems like a judgment call. Is it
your children that said this is what the room should look like or you?
Pam G.



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
